mapper.insert: insert into ms_tripartite_log (log_id, log_type, log_date, attribute1, attribute2, attribute3, attribute4, attribute5, attribute6, attribute7, attribute8, attribute9, attribute10 ) values( #{logId}, #{logType}, #{logDate}, #{attribute1}, #{attribute2}, #{attribute3}, #{attribute4}, #{attribute5}, #{attribute6}, #{attribute7}, #{attribute8}, #{attribute9}, #{attribute10} )

insert into ms_tripartite_enterprise_detail (det_id, ent_id, enterprise_account_name, personal_account_type, line_of_credit, cash_account ) values( #{detId}, #{entId}, #{enterpriseAccountName}, #{personalAccountType}, #{lineOfCredit}, #{cashAccount} )
mapper.update:
update ms_tripartite_enterprise_detail
line_of_credit = #{lineOfCredit,jdbcType=CHAR},
cash_account = #{cashAccount,jdbcType=CHAR}+cash_account,
cash_account = cash_account-#{cashRecharge,jdbcType=CHAR},

select DISTINCT med.enterprise_account_name enterpriseAccountName from ms_tripartite_enterprise_detail med
